awd_titl_txt: Cosmology, Theoretical Astrophysics, and Computational      Theoretical Physics
awd_abstract_narration: This award will support the research of Professor William                  H. Press, one postdoctoral fellow, and partial support for a                    graduate student, in the areas of cosmology, theoretical                        astrophysics, and computational theoretical physics, at                         Harvard University.  Continuing investigations by this group                    include:  three-dimensional computer simulations of                             fundamental fields that have been proposed as causing observed                  large scale structure; the theoretical development of future                    experimental and observational tests that might find, or rule                   out, additional scalar fields in gravity; the question of                       whether there are "natural" initial conditions for                              cosmological perturbations; some aspects of signal processing,                  e.g., for gravitational wave and dark matter experiments;                       computational algorithm development; and some other related                     problems.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
